review_data.title: Good food and ambiance
review_data.content: We had food from the Asian corner. Was very food. My eldest daughter had pizza, she loved it. We were sitting near the kids play area which is very convenient. All in all a very positive experience which we are looking forward to repeat.

review_data.title: Viva Mexico

review_data.title: Multi-Level food court, shopping complex
review_data.content: Nestled within the massive Europaalle location, Bridge (division of the Migros family) offers a multi-level shopping, food court dining, multiple bars, Café, a large sidewalk seating area and more. The place has standard to high-end shopping goods, specialty cheese, juices, fruits, bakery goods and more....More

review_data.title: Absolut super!
review_data.content: Tolle Mischung aus Gastro und Supermarkt. Grosse Auswahl an aussergewöhnlichen Produkten. Vielfältiges Gastroangebot mit super leckeren Gerichten und tollen Drinks!...More
